name: WheelsontheBus-USVersion
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wheels on the bus
des:
Famous Wheels on the bus rhyme for kids. 

The wheels on the bus go round and round
Round and round
Round and round
The wheels on the bus go round and round
All through the town
The wipers on the bus go Swish, swish, swish
Swish, swish, swish
Swish, swish, swish
The wipers on the bus go Swish, swish, swish
All through the town
The horn on the bus goes Beep, beep, beep
Beep, beep, beep
Beep, beep, beep
The horn on the bus goes Beep, beep, beep
All through the town
The doors on the bus go open and shut
Open and shut
Open and shut
The doors on the bus go open and shut
All through the town
The Driver on the bus says "Move on back
Move on back, move on back"
The Driver on the bus says "Move on back"
All through the town
The babies on the bus says "Wah, wah, wah
Wah, wah, wah
Wah, wah, wah"
The babies on the bus says "Wah, wah, wah"
All through the town
The mommies on the bus says "Shush, shush, shush
Shush, shush, shush
Shush, shush, shush"
The mommies on the bus says "Shush, shush, shush"
All through the town

The wheels on the bus rhyme is famous among children. The audio response in the skill is english. The audio is played for more than 20 minutes so that children remain engaged with the Alexa device. 


Session 1:
User: Alexa, open wheels on the bus
Alexa: Starting Wheels on the Bus - You can say, start or begin, to begin.
User: Begin
Alexa: Wheels on the Bus
<Alexa completes the song on user interruption>
User: Alexa, next
User: Alexa, stop
User: Alexa, shuffle
User: Alexa, next / previous
User: Alexa, resume
User: Alexa, start over
User: Yes/No


Session 2:
User: Alexa, open wheels on the bus
Alexa: You were listening to wheels on the bus, Would you like to resume?
User: No
Alexa: <Alexa starts over to the start and you can ask Alexa to step forward by saying Alexa, next> You are listening to The Wheels on the Bus. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Session 3:
User: Help
Alexa: You are listening to The Wheels on the Bus. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Last updated June 23, 2022
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
